title: Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641, Premium Hand Protection from Welder and Cutting Torch Heat, Commercial Quality, Cotton Lined, Gauntlet Cuff, Unisex, Grey, One Size
descriptions:
Introducing the Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641 - your reliable partner for heavy-duty welding tasks! These gloves are designed to offer maximum protection, with resistance to heat, flame, and chemicals. The exterior is made of top-grade split cowhide leather for exceptional durability, while the interior features a soft cotton fleece lining for enhanced comfort.

Our gloves boast fully welted seams and lock-stitch construction, ensuring they can withstand the toughest welding conditions. The stitching is made of Kevlar, a material known for its high tensile strength, further enhancing the gloves' durability.

The Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641 feature a winged thumb design for improved flexibility and ease of movement. The gauntlet cuff style, with a length of 13.5 inches, provides extended protection for your wrists and forearms.

These gloves are ideal for both MIG and stick welding applications. They are unisex, designed to fit most, and come in a stylish gray color. Each package contains one pair of gloves.

Safety and comfort meet in the Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641, making them an essential addition to your welding gear. Protect your hands and enjoy your welding tasks with confidence!
